history.proof: intros. unfold ex_lim in *. destruct filter_filter as [l filter_filter]. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros g f x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f' x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f' x' Hf Hlimf.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hlimf was not found in the current environment.

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : forall y : R, f y = g y H0 : exists l : Rbar, is_lim f x l l : Rbar_locally ?x (fun _ : R => True) filter_filter : forall P Q : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?x P -> Rbar_locally ?x Q -> Rbar_locally ?x (fun x : R => P x /\\ Q x) filter_imp : forall P Q : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, P x -> Q x) -> Rbar_locally ?x P -> Rbar_locally ?x Q The term "l" has type "match ?x with | Finite a => locally a (fun _ : R => True) | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> True | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> True end" while it is expected to have type "Rbar".

exceptions.tactic: apply (is_lim_ext f g x l Hf Hlimf).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
g: R -> R
f: R -> R
x: Rbar

Goal:
(forall y : R, f y = g y) -> ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x

Premises:
ex_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar) => exists l : Rbar, is_lim f x l : (R -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_lim_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x
is_lim_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), (forall y : R, f y = g y) -> is_lim f x l -> is_lim g x l
Lim_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x
is_lim_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> is_lim f x l -> is_lim g x l
Lim_correct : forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> is_lim f x (Lim f x)
ex_finite_lim_correct : forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_finite_lim f x < -> ex_lim f x /\ is_finite (Lim f x)
is_lim' = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => Rabs (f y - l0) < eps) | p_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => M < f y) | m_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y < M) end : (R -> R) -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _ _]
is_lim_comp' : forall (f0 : ?T -> R) (g0 : R -> R) (x0 l : Rbar), filterlim f0 ?F (Rbar_locally x0) -> is_lim g0 x0 l -> ?F (fun y : ?T => f0 y <> x0) -> filterlim (fun y : ?T => g0 (f0 y)) ?F (Rbar_locally l) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_ext : forall f0 g0 : ?T -> ?U, (forall x0 : ?T, f0 x0 = g0 x0) -> filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g0 ?F ?G where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (g0 : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g0 ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x0 : ?U * ?V => h (fst x0) (snd x0)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f0 x) (g0 x)) ?F ?I where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?W : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [f : R ->...-> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_ext_loc : forall f0 g0 : ?T -> ?U, ?F (fun x0 : ?T => f0 x0 = g0 x0) -> filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g0 ?F ?G where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_const : forall a : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a) ?F (locally a) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- UniformSpace] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [f : R -> R g : R -> R x : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
Lim_correct' : forall (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_finite_lim f x -> is_lim f x (Lim f x)
is_lim_unique : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> Lim f x = l
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
ex_finite_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar) => exists l : R, is_lim f x l : (R -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lim_comp_seq : forall (f : R -> R) (u : nat -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> eventually (fun n : nat => u n <> x) -> is_lim_seq u x -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => f (u n)) l
Rbar_mult_correct : forall x y : Rbar, ex_Rbar_mult x y -> is_Rbar_mult x y (Rbar_mult x y)
Lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x : Rbar) => Lim_seq (fun n : nat => f (Rbar_loc_seq x n)) : (R -> R) -> Rbar -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar) => filterlim f (Rbar_locally' x) (Rbar_locally l) : (R -> R) -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _ _]
is_Rbar_div = fun x y z : Rbar => is_Rbar_mult x (Rbar_inv y) z : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
filterlim_Rbar_mult : forall x y z : Rbar, is_Rbar_mult x y z -> filterlim (fun z0 : R * R => fst z0 * snd z0) (filter_prod (Rbar_locally x) (Rbar_locally y)) (Rbar_locally z)
Rbar_le_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
FEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> FExpr C -> R
Rabs_mult : forall x y : R, Rabs (x * y) = Rabs x * Rabs y
PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
minus = fun (G : AbelianGroup) (x y : G) => plus x (opp y) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> (C -> option C) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
Rbar_not_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_lt_not_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt y x -> ~ Rbar_le x y
Rabs_lt_between' : forall x y z : R, Rabs (x - y) < z < -> y - z < x < y + z
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
OmegaLemmas.OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, (z > 0)%Z -> (t > 0)%Z -> (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x * z + y * t)%Z
Rbar_le_lt_or_eq_dec : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> {Rbar_lt x y} + {x = y}
Rbar_locally = fun (a : Rbar) (P : R -> Prop) => match a with | Finite a0 => locally a0 P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end : Rbar -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]

```coq
intros g f x Hf Hlimf.
unfold ex_lim in *. unfold ex_lim in Hlimf. destruct Hlimf as [l Hlimf].
exists l.
apply (is_lim_ext f g x l Hf Hlimf).
Qed. 
```

original: intros g f x Hf Hlimf. unfold ex_lim in *. unfold ex_lim in Hlimf. destruct Hlimf as [l Hlimf]. exists l. apply (is_lim_ext f g x l Hf Hlimf).
